n0:createOracleTrigger.n0:source:
CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "FCERNY"."BSA_TRIGGER_UPDATE_PROJECT_TOOL" instead of UPDATE on bsa_view_project_tool FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE bsa_project_tool SET quantity = :new.quantity WHERE project_id = :new.project_id AND tool_id = :new.tool_id; END;
/ / ALTER TRIGGER "FCERNY"."BSA_TRIGGER_UPDATE_PROJECT_TOOL" ENABLE;
